Speaker: Frank
Text: Hey boss! You see the report I gave you on the project?
I did see the results Frank| nice work. But I did notice something on the report.
You've taken full credit of the project but last I thought, Olivia and Wilson were responsible for a majority of it.
Well you know me| I make a lot of decisions and| as much as you do| guide the team to great results.
In short| they followed my lead.
Come on| you should get it at least right? Their work is my work| and I got them to this point| we're a team after all.
